_header: Listeneth all and ye shall hear
Title(s): ‘How the Wyse Man Taght Hys Son’
Subjects: children, instructions for the behavior of; manners, treatises on; instruction, father to son

CULFf238.First Lines:
Lystenyth all and ye shall hereHow the godeman taght hys
                    sone…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…And ihesu bryne vs to hys bysThat for vs weryd the crowne of
                    thorne
